m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      Directory:Funding From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search Funding sources and resources. There are an abundant number of financial sources for the support of new energy research. This page is established to provide an index of the same. Task  Move here the contents from http://freeenergynews.com/Directory/Finance/ .
